Sentencas: In order to optimize the polarization resistance of the (La0.8Sr0.2)(0.95)MnO3-delta (LSM) cathode, Co3O4 nanoarray catalysts were self-assembled on the surface of the LSM substrate by a hydrothermal process.
Titulo: In situ construction of Co3O4 nanoarray catalysts on (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ cathode for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The phase composition and morphology of the precursor grown on the substrate before and after the heat treatment were characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM), respectively.
Titulo: In situ construction of Co3O4 nanoarray catalysts on (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ cathode for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that Co3O4 nanorods with a spinel structure and a size of 100 nm x 5 mu m (diameter x length) had grown on the surface of the LSM cathode.
Titulo: In situ construction of Co3O4 nanoarray catalysts on (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ cathode for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Symmetric cells and single cells with modified LSM cathodes (Co3O4-LSM-SDC/SDC/Co3O4-LSM-SDC and Co3O4-LSM-SDC/SDC/NiO-SDC, respectively, where SDC = Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9) were successfully constructed and their electrochemical performances were also investigated.
Titulo: In situ construction of Co3O4 nanoarray catalysts on (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ cathode for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The polarization impedance of the symmetric cell with the LSM cathode was 0.95 Omega cm(2) at 700 degrees C but decreased to 0.55 Omega cm(2) upon Co3O4 modification.
Titulo: In situ construction of Co3O4 nanoarray catalysts on (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ cathode for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the loading of the Co3O4 nanoarray onto the surface of the cathode improved the output of the single cell from 211.3.mW cm(-2) to 340.8 mW cm(-2).
Titulo: In situ construction of Co3O4 nanoarray catalysts on (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ cathode for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results indicate that the modification of the cathodes by the Co3O4 nanoarrays improved their performance dramatically.
Titulo: In situ construction of Co3O4 nanoarray catalysts on (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ cathode for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This modification serves as a new means to develop high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: In situ construction of Co3O4 nanoarray catalysts on (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ cathode for high-efficiency intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
